2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{

}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{

    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>

    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>

    </module>
    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\r'/>
        <property name='message' value='Use special escape sequence \\r instead of octal or Unicode escape'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\\"'/>

    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\\'/>

    </module>
    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>

}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='[^\\p{ASCII}]'/>
        <property name='message' value='Non-ASCII characters must be either actual Unicode characters or Unicode escapes'/>
    </module>"
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\s*\\/\\*\\*\\s*\\n(\\s*\\*.*\\n)*\\s*\\*\\/\\s*\\n'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing or malformed license header'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='^package\\s+.*\\s*;\\s*\\n'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing package statement'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='^import\\s+.*\\s*;\\s*\\n'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing import statements'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\s*\\n'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing blank line between sections'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\s*public\\s+class\\s+.*\\s*\\{\\s*\\n'/>
        <property name='message' value='Multiple top-level classes found'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.1 License or copyright information, if:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='id' value='Header'>
        <property name='format' value='^\/\*[\s\S]*\*\/$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Copyright or license information is missing'/>
    </module>"
}

}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",

        <property name='message' value='Each top-level class should reside in a source file of its own.'/>
    </module>"
}

    </module>"
}

{

    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.1 Vertical Whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\b(if|for|catch|else|while|do|switch|case|try|finally|return|throw|throws|synchronized)\\s*\\('/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing space after reserved word and before open parenthesis.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\b(else|catch|finally)\\s*\\{\\s*'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing space after reserved word and before opening curly brace.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='format' value='\\S\\s*([+\\-*/%&|^]|\\|\\||&&|\\?|:|->)\\s*\\S'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing space around binary or ternary operator.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='format' value='[,:;)]\\s*'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing space after , : ; or closing parenthesis.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='format' value='\\S\\s*//\\s*\\S'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing space between content and comment.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='format' value='\\S\\s*\\[\\]\\s*|\\S\\s*\\.\\.\\.'/>
        <property name='message' value='Missing space between type annotation and [] or ...'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpSinglelineJava'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\s*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Horizontal alignment is not required'/>
    </module>"
}

5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\w+'/>
        <property name='message' value='Identifiers should use only ASCII letters and digits'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='PackageName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\\.[a-z0-9]+)*$'/>
        <message key='package.name.invalid' value='Package name must use only lowercase letters and digits, and consecutive words should be concatenated together.'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.4 Constant names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='RegexpSinglelineJava'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][A-Z0-9_]*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Constant names should use UPPER_SNAKE_CASE'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreModifiers' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.5 Non-constant field names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Checker'>
        <module name='TreeWalker'>
            <module name='MemberName'>
                <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
                <property name='ignoreModifiers' value='true'/>
                <property name='ignoreStatic' value='false'/>
                <property name='tokens' value='VARIABLE_DEF'/>
            </module>
        </module>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",

        <property name='ignoreCase' value='false'/>

}
